meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a medium
meanings.sent1: Her mediumistic abilities allowed her to communicate with spirits.
meanings.sent2: The mediumistic painting captured the essence of the spiritual realm.
meanings.sent3: The mediumistic cat seemed to predict when the mail would arrive.
meanings.sent4: His mediumistic aura glowed with an otherworldly light.
meanings.sent5: The mediumistic energy in the room was palpable, sending shivers down my spine.

meanings.sent1: The mediumistic psychic accurately predicted the future.
meanings.sent2: She had a mediumistic gift for connecting with the unseen.
meanings.sent3: The mediumistic dog barked at things no one else could see.
meanings.sent4: His mediumistic intuition guided him through life's uncertainties.
meanings.sent5: The mediumistic child could sense emotions before they were expressed.
